description.value:
Activate 2 (manipulate)

The dried, shrunken corpse of a giant tarantula inside this smoked glass bottle is obscured by swirling vapor and cobwebs. You can throw the ampoule up to 30 feet when you Activate it. When you open or throw the ampoule, a Large giant tarantula effigy bursts forth and lunges at one adjacent creature. If the target fails a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21] save, it takes @Damage[(1d10+4)[piercing]] damage. If the target critically fails the save, it's also exposed to tarantula venom (Monster Core 321).

Craft Requirements Supply the corpse of a giant tarantula.
